title: My Development
subtitle: My workflow as a Senior Full Stack Developer focuses on scalability, maintainability, and cross-team collaboration. Each stage ensures quality and consistency across projects.

discovery.title: Research & Discovery
discovery.description: Understand client's goals, constraints and users. Define success metrics and feasibility.

architecture.title: Architecture & Planning
architecture.description: Design scalable system architecture, select stack (Next.js, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Docker) and plan milestones and CI/CD.

implementation.title: Development & Integration
implementation.description: Implement frontend and backend modules, integrate APIs and services, perform code reviews and enforce clean architecture.

delivery.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
delivery.description: Automated tests, performance audits and manual QA for edge cases to ensure production reliability.

monitoring.title: Deployment & Monitoring
monitoring.description: Deploy to Vercel or containerized environments, configure CI/CD, monitor uptime and performance, and run post-launch improvements.

cta.title: Ready to start your project?
cta.description: Let's discuss your needs and create a custom plan that delivers real value to your business.
